description: This file contains Polymer framework's core JavaScript code embedded within an HTML script tag, defining Polymer's base classes, behaviors, and registration mechanisms.

classes.name: Polymer.Base
classes.description: Core base class providing lifecycle callbacks, property management, behaviors, and feature registration for Polymer elements.

classes.name: Polymer.DomModule
classes.description: Represents a DOM module for defining custom elements and their templates.

methods.name: Polymer
methods.description: Function to define a new Polymer element, extending its prototype and registering it.

methods.name: Polymer.RenderStatus.whenReady
methods.description: Registers a callback to be called when Polymer rendering is ready.

methods.name: Polymer.RenderStatus._makeReady
methods.description: Marks Polymer rendering as complete and executes queued callbacks.

methods.name: Polymer.Base._addFeature
methods.description: Adds features or behaviors to Polymer classes.
